hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t.uuid as uuid, t.id as id, t.name as name from AppFunction t where 1 = 1 and t.uuid not in(:excludeUuids) <if isNotBlank(functionType)> and t.type = :functionType </if> <if isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(code) || isNotBlank(id)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(t.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(t.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(id)> or lower(t.id) like '%${id?lower_case}%' </if> ) </if> order by code asc,name
select t.uuid as uuid, t.id as id, t.name as name from AppFunction t where t.id in (:appFuncIds) order by code asc,name
select t.uuid as uuid, t.id as id, t.name as name from AppFunction t where t.uuid in (:appFuncUuids) order by code asc,name
